body:
It looks like that the query in [`mysql/Schema.php::findConstraints()`](https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/master/framework/db/mysql/Schema.php#L247) does not work on some environments.

Most likely it is be broken by https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/commit/e4f5b91f74e37d5acc2c7d01f977a29e790532b6 (@samdark)

@fillup could you check locally _without_ the following part of SQL:

```
    (
        kcu.constraint_catalog = rc.constraint_catalog OR
        (kcu.constraint_catalog IS NULL AND rc.constraint_catalog IS NULL)
    ) AND
```
TokuDB storage engine with MariaDB doesn't support foreign keys.

@SilverFire looks like both versions of the query return empty sets when run directly on the db, just not through migrations:

```
Server version: 10.1.10-MariaDB-1~jessie-log mariadb.org binary distribution

Copyright (c) 2000, 2015, Oracle, MariaDB Corporation Ab and others.

Type 'help;' or '\h' for help. Type '\c' to clear the current input statement.

MariaDB [(none)]> SELECT
    ->     kcu.constraint_name,
    ->     kcu.column_name,
    ->     kcu.referenced_table_name,
    ->     kcu.referenced_column_name
    -> FROM information_schema.referential_constraints AS rc
    -> JOIN information_schema.key_column_usage AS kcu ON
    ->     (
    ->         kcu.constraint_catalog = rc.constraint_catalog OR
    ->         (kcu.constraint_catalog IS NULL AND rc.constraint_catalog IS NULL)
    ->     ) AND
    ->     kcu.constraint_schema = rc.constraint_schema AND
    ->     kcu.constraint_name = rc.constraint_name
    -> WHERE rc.constraint_schema = database() AND kcu.table_schema = database()
    -> AND rc.table_name = 'migration' AND kcu.table_name = 'migration';
Empty set (0.00 sec)

MariaDB [(none)]> SELECT
    ->     kcu.constraint_name,
    ->     kcu.column_name,
    ->     kcu.referenced_table_name,
    ->     kcu.referenced_column_name
    -> FROM information_schema.referential_constraints AS rc
    -> JOIN information_schema.key_column_usage AS kcu ON
    ->
    ->     kcu.constraint_schema = rc.constraint_schema AND
    ->     kcu.constraint_name = rc.constraint_name
    -> WHERE rc.constraint_schema = database() AND kcu.table_schema = database()
    -> AND rc.table_name = 'migration' AND kcu.table_name = 'migration';
Empty set (0.00 sec)
```
@df2 thanks for the suggestion, I'm using InnoDB. The only difference is switching between yii 2.0.6 and 2.0.7.

@rumatakira you have a completely different problem and it looks like misconfiguration. Ensure, that your console application uses the common config or try to add the db component to the console application config directly
@fillup thank you for the report. Fixed in https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/commit/2201bf14e239477b52cfb1f331e0c7b92d98e2cb
Oh, that's pretty bad thing you've fixed... :+1:
